deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.subtitle: We're saddened that you've decided to leave. Your presence in our community has been valued.
deleteAccount.warningTitle: Important: This Action Cannot Be Undone
deleteAccount.warningIntro: Once you delete your account, all of your data will be permanently removed. This includes:
deleteAccount.beforeYouGoText: If you're experiencing issues, we'd love to help! Consider reaching out to our support team instead. We're here to make your experience better.
deleteAccount.confirmMessage: This will permanently delete your account. Are you absolutely sure?
deleteAccount.successMessage: Your account has been deleted successfully.
deleteAccount.errorNotLoggedIn: Please log in to delete your account
deleteAccount.errorGeneric: Failed to delete account. Please try again.

refer.sendCodeDescription: Send this code to new users and build your circle. Your code never changes.
refer.tapRefreshToGenerate: Tap refresh to generate your code
refer.shareMessage: Join me on Pookiey! Use my referral code {{code}} when you sign up.
refer.step1Text: Send your 6-letter invite to friends you want on Pookiey.
refer.step2Text: They enter your code during signup. Each code is unique and locked to you.
refer.step3Text: We'll keep your circle updated with new perks as they arrive.
refer.onboardingSubtitle: Enter your friend's code to unlock special benefits and get started on your journey!

helpCenter.title: Help Center
helpCenter.subtitle: We're here to help! Contact us for any questions or support.
helpCenter.subject: Subject
helpCenter.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...
helpCenter.faq1Question: How do I delete my account?
helpCenter.faq1Answer: You can delete your account by going to Settings > Account Settings > Delete Account. Please note that this action cannot be undone.
helpCenter.faq2Question: How do I report inappropriate behavior?
helpCenter.faq2Answer: If you encounter any inappropriate behavior, please report it immediately using the report button on the user's profile or contact our support team directly.
helpCenter.faq3Question: How do I change my location?
helpCenter.faq3Answer: You can update your location in Settings > Dating Preferences > Update Location. Make sure to enable location permissions for accurate results.
helpCenter.emailNotConfiguredMessage: Please configure an email client on your device to send emails.
helpCenter.errorOpeningEmail: Unable to open email client. Please contact us directly at support@pookiey.com
helpCenter.errorOpeningPhone: Unable to make phone call. Please contact us directly at +1 (555) 123-4567
helpCenter.pleaseEnterMessage: Please enter a message before sending.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: At Pookiey, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our dating application.
privacyPolicy.section1Content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
privacyPolicy.section1Point1: Profile information (name, age, photos, bio, interests, location)
privacyPolicy.section1Point3: Communication data (messages, voice notes, photos shared within the app)
privacyPolicy.section1Point4: Usage data (how you interact with the app, features you use)
privacyPolicy.section2Content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, including matching you with potential partners, facilitating communication, and personalizing your experience. We also use your information to send you notifications, respond to your inquiries, and ensure the safety and security of our platform.
privacyPolicy.section3Content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following circumstances:
privacyPolicy.section3Point1: With other users as part of the matching and communication features
privacyPolicy.section3Point2: With service providers who assist us in operating our platform (subject to confidentiality agreements)
privacyPolicy.section3Point3: When required by law or to protect our rights and the safety of our users
privacyPolicy.section4Content: We collect location information to help you find matches nearby. You can control location sharing through your device settings. We use location data only to provide location-based matching and do not share your precise location with other users.
privacyPolicy.section5Content: Your data security is our top priority. All your personal information and data are stored securely on Indian servers, ensuring complete protection and compliance with Indian data protection regulations. We implement state-of-the-art technical and organizational measures including encryption, secure data transmission, and regular security audits to safeguard your information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Your data is totally safe with us and we do not share your personal information with anyone, except as explicitly stated in this policy for the purpose of providing our matching and communication services within the app.
privacyPolicy.section6Content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time through your account settings. You can also opt out of certain communications and control your privacy settings within the app.
privacyPolicy.section7Content: Our services are intended for users who are 18 years of age or older. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If you believe we have collected information from a child under 18, please contact us immediately.
privacyPolicy.section8Content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
privacyPolicy.contactContent: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at:
privacyPolicy.footer: By using Pookiey, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy.
